explanations.reason: The paper focuses on empirical analysis of mergers and acquisitions (M&A) in the SAARC and ASEAN regions, examining financial performance and agency issues. The methodologies used are two-sample t-test and OLS regression, which are statistical methods rather than machine learning or deep learning techniques. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or large language models are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
